feature.name: NR Downlink-Only Cell Support for Carrier Aggregation
feature.summary: This feature introduces downlink-only support for the NR downlink carrier aggregation

parameters.name: NRCellDU.cellBarred
parameters.description: The NRCellDU.cellBarred attribute must be set                                     to BARRED for Low-Band cells if the value of                                     the NRSectorCarrier.txDirection attribute is                                     set to DL.

parameters.name: NRCellDU.pMaxCa
parameters.description: This attribute is not applicable to downlink-only cells.

parameters.name: NRCellDU.pointAFrequencyUlFdd
parameters.description: Not applicable if the value of the                                         NRSectorCarrier.txDirection attribute is                                     set to DL.

parameters.name: NRCellDU.ulAvailableCrbs
parameters.description: The NRCellDU.ulAvailableCrbs attribute must be                                     empty if the value of the                                         NRSectorCarrier.txDirection attribute is                                     set to DL.

parameters.name: NRSectorCarrier.arfcnUL
parameters.description: The value of the NRSectorCarrier.arfcnUL                                     attribute must be set to 0 for Low-Band if the                                     value of the NRSectorCarrier.txDirection                                     attribute is set to DL.                                     Value                                     set to 0 means that the                                     uplink channel number is empty for Low-Band and the value of the                                         NRSectorCarrier.txDirection attribute is                                     set to DL.

parameters.name: NRSectorCarrier.bSChannelBwUL
parameters.description: The value of the NRSectorCarrier.bSChannelBwUl                                     attribute is not applicable for Low-Band if the                                         NRSectorCarrier.txDirection                                     attribute has the value set to                                         DL.

parameters.name: NRSectorCarrier.essScPairId
parameters.description: If the NRSectorCarrier.essScPairId attribute                                     is configured, the value of the                                         NRSectorCarrier.arfcnDL attribute must be                                     different than the value of the                                         NRSectorCarrier.arfcnUL                                     attribute.                                     The values of the                                         NRSectorCarrier.bSChannelBwUL and the                                         NRSectorCarrier.bSChannelBwDL attributes                                     must be set to 10, 15, or                                         20 and the                                         NRSectorCarrier.txDirection attribute                                     must be set to                                     DL_AND_UL.

parameters.name: NRSectorCarrier.noOfRxAntennas
parameters.description: The NRSectorCarrier.noOfRxAntennas attribute                                     must be set to 0 if the value of the                                         NRSectorCarrier.txDirection attribute is                                     set to DL.

parameters.name: NRSectorCarrier.txDirection
parameters.description: The value of the NRSectorCarrier.txDirection                                     attribute being set to DL is only applicable                                     for Low-Band if the NR Downlink-Only Cell Support for Carrier                                     Aggregation feature is enabled.  The NRCellDU.administrativeState attribute                                     must be set to LOCKED when changing the                                         NRSectorCarrier.txDirection                                     attribute.

parameters.name: NRSectorCarrier.ueAssistedPrecodingOptEnabled
parameters.description: The                                         NRSectorCarrier.ueAssistedPrecodingOptEnabled                                     must be set to FALSE for Low-Band cells if the                                     value of the NRSectorCarrier.txDirection                                     attribute is set to DL.

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012777 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012777 MO instance.
